title: What Is The FBI Hiding? (Ep 1832)
description:
Why is the FBI hiding this critical piece of information? In this episode, I address the FBI’s latest subterfuge, and the election earthquake last night. 

News Picks:

Why is the FBI warning of “civil war.”

A new enemies list? Conservatives, Trump allies targeted by the DOJ.


The Washington Post acknowledges the real strategy to deny Trump due process. 

In concession, Cheney compares self to Lincoln, doesn’t endorse GOP primary victor Hageman.

Even a limited nuclear war with China would be devastating.
